review: The consultation experience was good with the doctor. I visited for my Gynec ( PCOD ) problem and the doctor listened to my problems. The medicine and the suggestions she prescribed were helpful to cure the problem. I got to know about the doctor from Practo. It was good nothing to improve. Her behaviour was good and polite. I think my experience was very good.

Doctor behaviour was good and listened to our problem and everything was good. I went for my wife's treatment and we are satisfied with the doctor treatment. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. The appointment happened on time and everything was good in the hospital.

**** ************** ******** ******* *** ****** ***** waited 3 hr after that ************** dr says she don't treat procto.. when it was informed and paid fee why don't they informed.. she was busy in gossip with one of known family members and patients were waiting out side.. ********** ****** **** ** **** *** ***** ********* **** **** **** * *** *** ** *** ***** ** ********* not even seen my wife and initially denied to refund too..

No value for anyones time. In OPD will call at 10:00 am and doctor wont come in OPD till 1:30. 
We are responsible for These kind of doctors arrogance and no respect for anyones time.
Do think a million times before taking appointment there are many gyneos who respect time and are better

We met the doctor for consultation as my wife had a pregnancy-related issue. Later delivery happened. Treatment was good. Waiting time was not there when I went. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicines were not prescribed. Now she is fine.

Been to hospital and patient was my wife. She had a health issue related to gynecological / Endometriosis. Treatment and the doctor was good. Blood tests and scanning was done. Medicines were also prescribed. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was not much. Now she is fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor side is good but there is no pharmacy in hospital, because of this I lost my credit card,,, am requesting to hospital management to place pharmacy in hospital

The doctor was **** *** helpful. She did give time for the consultation. I would recommend the doctors to others. The suggestions and the medications she gave was helpful to cure my problem. Waiting time was more as we were waiting for more time.
I went to meet doctor and doctor was really helpful.The Consultation was very good. He was listening to me and it was useful and I would recommend the doctor to others too.
